@CHCInvestments @Dr_Stoxx They're too caught up in the news cycle to listen to what the price action is telling them. I've already got my shopping list ready after reviewing charts this weekend.

$HUM - inverse head and shoulders, with strong resistance at $475, but it may really fly above that. Aiming for $470.

$WHR - 3 candle reversal (with bull flag breakout on weekly) opened at the 20 day sma Friday and traded up. XHB/SPY is still in an uptrend. Really liking this one.

$NOC - breaking above long term support/resistance line after double bottom.

$MSFT - great price action Friday, should be good for a swing to retest ATH or ~$350ish.

$TSLA - as the doc has mentioned, setting up to breakout. I see a bull pennant there. I think it's good for a run to 1050 this week. May swing calls.

I added an accumulation/distribution study (Acc/Dist in ToS) and am picking stocks with accumulative uptrends to avoid dead cat rallies. Still experimenting with that indicator.
